name: Bay
description: A protected bay creates an ideal natural harbor with calm waters and easy access to the open sea. The sheltered location makes it perfect for settlements and trade, while the surrounding headlands provide excellent defensive positions.
atmosphere: Sheltered paradise of calm water protected by natural headlands. Perfect natural harbor with storm protection and enclosure feeling. Gentle waves and seabird calls create peaceful maritime atmosphere. Easy access to open sea creates distant lands connection. Fresh salt water and marine life scent.
